document.heading: Merit Personnel Early Out Retirement Revisions Temporary Amendment Act of 1995

history.narrative: Law 11-25, the “Merit Personnel Early Out Retirement Revisions Temporary Amendment Act of 1995,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-211. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 4, 1995, and May 2, 1995, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 15, 1995, it was assigned Act No. 11-53 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-25 became effective on July 14, 1995.
